703043f-a.text:
Atlantic Ave., north side, from and including Clermont Ave., to, but not including Adelphi Street.   The view also shows Clermont Ave., west side, from and including Atlantic Ave., to, but not including Fulton Street.   This is a view of an old Brooklyn neighborhood.   Frame houses may be seen at 510-512 Clerment Ave., and in the background, the Fulton Street Elevated Lines.
November 26, 1927.

P. L. Sperr
703043f-a.folder: Atlantic Avenue & Clermont Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
